response.explain: Since there is no previous action code or execution error, we can start planning from scratch. The task goal is to put a bottle of sunscreen in the carryall. The bottle of sunscreen is currently 2.51 meters away from the robot, which is out of the robot's reach. Therefore, the robot needs to move closer to the bottle of sunscreen before it can pick it up.
response.subtask:
(1) Move the robot to the bottle of sunscreen.
(2) Grasp the bottle of sunscreen.
(3) Move the robot to the carryall.
(4) Put the bottle of sunscreen in the carryall.
response.code:
